named-query.name: countFolders
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(f) FROM Folder f WHERE (UPPER(f.name) LIKE :name OR :name IS NULL) AND (f.alias = :alias OR :alias IS NULL) AND (f.parentFolderId = :parentFolderId OR :parentFolderId IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(f.folderId, ',')), :folderId) > 0) OR :folderId IS NULL)

named-query.name: findFolders
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM Folder f WHERE (UPPER(f.name) LIKE :name OR :name IS NULL) AND (f.alias = :alias OR :alias IS NULL) AND (f.parentFolderId = :parentFolderId OR :parentFolderId IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(f.folderId, ',')), :folderId) > 0) OR :folderId IS NULL) ORDER BY f.folderId

named-query.name: countFeeds
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(f) FROM Feed f WHERE (UPPER(f.name) LIKE :name OR :name IS NULL) AND (UPPER(f.url) LIKE :url OR :url IS NULL) AND (UPPER(f.type) = :type OR :type IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(f.feedId, ',')), :feedId) > 0) OR :feedId IS NULL)

named-query.name: findFeeds
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM Feed f WHERE (UPPER(f.name) LIKE :name OR :name IS NULL) AND (UPPER(f.url) LIKE :url OR :url IS NULL) AND (UPPER(f.type) = :type OR :type IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(f.feedId, ',')), :feedId) > 0) OR :feedId IS NULL) ORDER BY f.feedId

named-query.name: countFeedFolders
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(ff) FROM FeedFolder ff WHERE ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(ff.feedId, ',')), :feedId) > 0) OR :feedId IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(ff.folderId, ',')), :folderId) > 0) OR :folderId IS NULL)

named-query.name: findFeedFolders
named-query.query: SELECT ff FROM FeedFolder ff WHERE ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(ff.feedId, ',')), :feedId) > 0) OR :feedId IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(ff.folderId, ',')), :folderId) > 0) OR :folderId IS NULL)

named-query.name: findFeedFolderViews
named-query.query: SELECT fe.feedId, fe.name, fe.url, fe.type, fo.folderId, fo.name FROM Folder fo JOIN fo.feedFolders ff JOIN ff.feed fe WHERE ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(fe.feedId, ',')), :feedId) > 0) OR :feedId IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(fo.folderId, ',')), :folderId) > 0) OR :folderId IS NULL)

named-query.name: removeFeedFolders

named-query.name: countEntries
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(e) FROM Entry e WHERE (UPPER(e.title) LIKE :title OR :title IS NULL) AND (UPPER(e.url) LIKE :url OR :url IS NULL) AND (e.pubDateTime >= :startDateTime OR :startDateTime IS NULL) AND (e.pubDateTime <= :endDateTime OR :endDateTime IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(e.entryId, ',')), :entryId) > 0) OR :entryId IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(e.feedId, ',')), :feedId) > 0) OR :feedId IS NULL) AND ( (:excludeInvisible = 'N') OR ( (:excludeInvisible = 'Y') AND (e.strVisible IS NULL OR e.strVisible = 'Y') ) )

named-query.name: findEntries
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Entry e WHERE (UPPER(e.title) LIKE :title OR :title IS NULL) AND (UPPER(e.url) LIKE :url OR :url IS NULL) AND (e.pubDateTime >= :startDateTime OR :startDateTime IS NULL) AND (e.pubDateTime <= :endDateTime OR :endDateTime IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(e.entryId, ',')), :entryId) > 0) OR :entryId IS NULL) AND ((LOCATE(CONCAT(',', CONCAT(e.feedId, ',')), :feedId) > 0) OR :feedId IS NULL) AND ( (:excludeInvisible = 'N') OR ( (:excludeInvisible = 'Y') AND (e.strVisible IS NULL OR e.strVisible = 'Y') ) ) ORDER BY e.pubDateTime DESC, e.entryId
